barabasy69 wrote:
....
>
>
> On second thought, all I want is to be able to identify the source of
> an ARC record. So, maybe it is possible for me to add an header in
> the metadata line of an arc record.
>








Unfortunately, the set of columns stored on the metadata line is 
immutable (See here for more on the ARC format: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual.html#arcs).  Whats 
needed is the Next Generation of the ARC format.  This will allow 
storing of arbitrary metadata but NG-ARC isn't here yet.
>
> The javadoc api for
> ARCRecordMetaData has a method getHeaderFields(). Are those headers
> the same as HTTP headers?
>






Yes.  They are populated by the ARCReader.  It reapplies the commons 
HttpClient Header parsing code.

St.Ack
